item.title: NAV Patterns Archive
item.description: NAV Patterns Archive About the archive This section of the site is a careful reproduction of the content of the Original Microsoft Community NAV Design Patterns project, created with permission. Reading the archive Bear in mind, many of the style and formatting guidelines in this section have been brought forward into: The automatic formatting provided by the AL Extension The Code Analyzers Additionally, a variety of topics around the Windows Client and DotNet are outdated, and should only be used for either reference or if working in older environments.
